bug.author: ilyachur
bug.summary: Specialize_function adds redundant ops for functions with Split operation
bug.description:
Hi, I found that specialize_function adds GetOutputElement operations after an operation with several outputs. I created a reproducer here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NervanaSystems/ngraph/pull/3931>#3931</denchmark-link>
It is really unexpectedly for me.
